Kastak Arms' Stoneskin is a combat undersuit that are built upon CDS' famous TCS-4 system based on extensive feedback from the operators who rely on this technology in the field. Offering a myriad of options for armor and EVA capabilities, the Stoneskin is set to rival CDS as a rugged and reliable undersuit.
